title: Optimized Deep Learning Models for Effluent Prediction in Wastewater Treatment Processes
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3EW00875D, Paper
Canyun Yang, Zhuoyue Guo, Yun Geng, Fengshan Zhang, Wenguang Wei, Hongbin Liu
Monitoring wastewater holds significant importance in minimizing pollution discharge and enhancing resource utilization. This study aims to develop a soft sensor for the prediction and optimization of critical wastewater treatment...
